projects.title: Game Discoverer
projects.techStacks: ReactJS, TypeScript,  Chakra UI, Rawg.io Database API
projects.projectInfo: A website that utilizes a database of over 1000s games to help users find new games based on genres, publishers, and gaming platform.

projects.title: Twitter Clone
projects.techStacks: ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Tailwind, JavaScript
projects.projectInfo: A Twitter clone that involves several components and technologies working together to replicate core functionalities of Twitter.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.projectInfo: My Portfolio that showcases projects developed during studies, internships, or personal endeavors. Each project details the   technologies used, and outcomes achieved
